### verifyBlocksInRegion() {#aa810600b55e9dd028b740ab4a45874bb}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>bool VPlanVerifier::verifyBlocksInRegion (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vpregionblock">VPRegionBlock</a> &#42; Region)</>}>
Helper function that verifies the CFG invariants of the VPBlockBases within <code><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/region">Region</a></code>.

Checks in this function are generic for VPBlockBases. They are not specific for VPBasicBlocks or VPRegionBlocks.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/vectorize/vplanverifier-cpp/#l00051">51</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/vectorize/vplanverifier-cpp">VPlanVerifier.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### verifyEVLRecipe() {#a263faa2dde080ab369462625af8f9dd9}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>bool VPlanVerifier::verifyEVLRecipe (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vpinstruction">VPInstruction</a> &amp; EVL) const</>}>
Verify that <code>EVL</code> is used correctly.

The user must be either in EVL-based recipes as a last operand or VPInstruction::Add which is incoming value into EVL&#39;s recipe.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/vectorize/vplanverifier-cpp/#l00041">41</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/vectorize/vplanverifier-cpp">VPlanVerifier.cpp</a>.

### verifyRegion() {#ab33211cb0b9468e472f048ef37b24fa5}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>bool VPlanVerifier::verifyRegion (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vpregionblock">VPRegionBlock</a> &#42; Region)</>}>
Verify the CFG invariants of <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vpregionblock">VPRegionBlock</a> <code><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/region">Region</a></code> and its nested VPBlockBases.

Do not recurse inside nested VPRegionBlocks.

Verify the CFG invariants of <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vpregionblock">VPRegionBlock</a> <code><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/region">Region</a></code> and its nested VPBlockBases.

Recurse inside nested VPRegionBlocks.
